description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
age provided by author in data file
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
number of correct trials in the session/ empty columns = participant did not finish or did not participate

pretest (preference test before the first test trial session)- participants were presented with one banana pellet and one carrot piece / test- participants were presented with two transparent buckets containing different populations of bananas (4:1) and carrots (1:4) in equal size where experimenter drew one item from each bucket
food choice during preference test/ empty columns = participant did not finish or not participate. Note: 0 values in Zola entries are unknown
whether participant chose the sample coming from the correct population (the population that includes more of their preferred items)
participant response side - left or right
participant drop out /not included in analyses
